rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型纳米传感器记录脊髓神经元的电活动植入技术显着提高了我们研究甚至调节大脑神经元活动的能力，但脊髓神经元的活动却很难研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-nanosized-sensor-records-the-electrical-activity-of-spinal-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/New-nanosized-sensor-records-the-electrical-activity-of-spinal-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0b2fbc3-5b4b-4cf1-9782-cb664d725da2 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 22:23:27 -0400 New nanosized sensor records the electrical activity of spinal neurons
CD22靶向CAR-T疗法在复发性大B细胞淋巴瘤中显示出有希望的结果CAR-T 细胞疗法以癌细胞表面的特定蛋白质为目标，可使大约一半的大 B 细胞淋巴瘤患者的肿瘤缩小或消失，而这些患者在化疗后尚未出现好转。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/CD22-targeted-CAR-T-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-relapsed-large-B-cell-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/CD22-targeted-CAR-T-therapy-shows-promising-results-in-relapsed-large-B-cell-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d689b27-80d8-4700-82d3-2f7b78d7e0b9 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:40:35 -0400 CD22-targeted CAR-T therapy shows promising results in relapsed large B-cell lymphoma
通过纳米颗粒免疫优化流感疫苗策略佐治亚州立大学生物医学科学研究所的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，为了提供针对多种流感病毒变种的交叉保护，纳米颗粒疫苗可以产生关键的细胞和粘膜免疫反应，从而增强疫苗功效并扩大保护范围。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Optimizing-influenza-vaccine-strategies-with-nanoarticle-immunization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Optimizing-influenza-vaccine-strategies-with-nanoarticle-immunization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9387fa1-78a4-4344-a490-1ffde4c4715b Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:36:20 -0400 Optimizing influenza vaccine strategies with nanoparticle immunization
Prime编辑为囊性纤维化的永久治疗提供了有希望的途径囊性纤维化是最常见的遗传性疾病之一，会导致肺部和身体其他部位出现浓稠粘液积聚、呼吸问题和感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prime-editing-offers-promising-path-to-permanent-treatment-for-cystic-chemistry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prime-editing-offers-promising-path-to-permanent-treatment-for-cystic-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f012f90-83c5-47fe-9e27-e4f6e963d7f9 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:27:14 -0400 Prime editing offers promising path to permanent treatment for cystic fibrosis
孤独对记忆的负面影响比社会孤立更大大约三分之一的加拿大人感到孤独，滑铁卢大学的一项研究表明，孤独对记忆的负面影响甚至比社会隔离还要大，尽管两者都对人口老龄化构成重大风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Loneiness-can-have-greater-negative-impact-on-memory-than-social-isolation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Loneiness-can-have-greater-negative-impact-on-memory-than-social-isolation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb643abe-a4fa-4276-ae08-34bb7d78c291 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:22:31 -0400 Loneliness can have greater negative impact on memory than social isolation
新模型可以预测阿尔茨海默氏症引起的轻度认知障碍患者的认知能力下降阿姆斯特丹 UMC 阿尔茨海默病中心开发了一种预测模型，可以预测因阿尔茨海默病导致的轻度认知障碍或轻度痴呆患者的认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Novel-model-could-predict-cognitive-decline-in-病人-with-mild-cognitive-impairment- due-to-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Novel-model-could-predict-cognitive-decline-in-病人-with-mild-cognitive-impairment-due-to-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0bdffe4-0c7a-43c7-9318-5ab1f903e4c5 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:13:15 -0400 Novel model could predict cognitive decline in patients with mild cognitive impairment due to Alzheimer's
新型 Co-STAR 细胞有望靶向和根除癌症约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心及其路德维希中心、Lustgarten 实验室和 Bloomberg-Kimmel 癌症免疫治疗研究所的研究人员利用基因工程技术设计了一种新型细胞来识别和对抗癌症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Novel-Co-STAR-cells-show-promise-in-targeting-and-eradicating-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Novel-Co-STAR-cells-show-promise-in-targeting-and-eradicating-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aba47403-989e-49dc-b00c-969570237655 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:07:00 -0400 Novel Co-STAR cells show promise in targeting and eradicating cancer
美国医院采用远程医疗的综合研究揭示了进展和挑战密歇根州立大学研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，从 2017 年到 2022 年，美国医院提供的远程医疗服务显着增加，同时也强调了其全面实施的持续障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Compliance-study-of-telemedicine-adoption-in-US-hospitals-reveals-progress-and-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Compliance-study-of-telemedicine-adoption-in-US-hospitals-reveals-progress-and-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d87dc8d6-341f-4961-8b95-ae5f6e4dbdcf Thu, 11 Jul 2024 15:01:12 -0400 Comprehensive study of telemedicine adoption in U.S. hospitals reveals progress and challenges
科学家解决了母乳喂养女性骨骼如何保持强健的长期难题加州大学旧金山分校和加州大学戴维斯分校的研究人员解决了一个长期存在的难题：即使母乳喂养的女性因牛奶而失去钙质，她们的骨骼如何保持强健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Scientists-solve-long-stand-puzzle-about-how-breastfeeding-womens-bones-remain-strong.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Scientists-solve-long-standing-puzzle-about-how-breastfeeding-womens-bones-remain-strong.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb78c285-4f07-4820-a766-ca0ce547a401 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:55:26 -0400 Scientists solve long-standing puzzle about how breastfeeding women's bones remain strong
美国成年人使用尼古丁袋的流行率较低一项新研究发现，尽管 2019 年至 2022 年间该产品的销量增长了 641%，但美国成年人中尼古丁袋的使用率较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prevalence-of-nicotine-pouch-use-found-to-be-low-among-US-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240711/Prevalence-of-nicotine-pouch-use-found-to-be-low-among-US-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fb3ede4-7756-4d4f-b037-1d413b0a5b56 Thu, 11 Jul 2024 14:48:41 -0400 Prevalence of nicotine pouch use found to be low among U.S. adults
